title: Ven Kassapa Thero (OBE) in the UK urges all Sri Lankans to vote for President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma The Chief Incumbent of the Birminham Buddhist Vihara, the President of the Midlands Buddhist Association in the UK, the President of the Buddhist Relief Organisation (IBRO) attached to the United Nations (UN) and the Vice President of the Sri Lankan Sangha Sabha of the UK, Venerable Dr. Witharandeniye Kassapa…
